name: TRICK or treat (Lachlan)
description:
Halloween is quite a popular holiday; kids knock on strangers doors and receive treats, or, if no treat is given, they have the right to perform mischief. But what happens when a twisted, deranged child interprets these holiday laws? Well, lets find out!

NOTE: The following game assimilates themes of murder. If this disturbs you in any way, please don't play.

THEMES: Halloween, Twisted Laws
